goals__remit:
Ecologists Without Borders Association brings together enthusiastic activists and is one of the leading Slovenian NGOs dedicated to improving the state of the environment, focusing on efficient resource use (waste prevention&reduction) and active citizenship. 
 
Our goals are high – we are actively changing human habits and patterns that are harmful to the environment, on the local and global scale. Our success lies in the positive and inclusive approach to people and problems, using interactive and entertaining tools and methods, suited to all segments of the targeted population. We promote cooperation and the power of individuals to change the world, especially when united for a single purpose, since we believe "there are no passengers on spaceship Earth, we are all crew," as Marshall McLuhan put it.
relevant_communication:
Most recently, we worked on food waste prevention in the public sector and campaigned against plastic pollution. 
 
More about our work can be seen on our website.
